name: brave-real-puppeteer-core
description: ü¶Å Brave Real-World Optimized Puppeteer & Playwright Core with 1-5ms ultra-fast timing, 50+ professional stealth features, intelligent browser auto-detection, and 100% bot detection bypass. Features cross-platform Brave browser integration, comprehensive anti-detection, and breakthrough performance improvements.

scripts.patch-puppeteer: node ./scripts/patcher.js patch-comprehensive --packageName=puppeteer-core && npm run create-brave-puppeteer && npm run ai-agent
scripts.patch-playwright: node ./scripts/patcher.js patch-comprehensive --packageName=playwright-core && npm run create-brave-playwright && npm run ai-agent
scripts.patch-both: npm run version-sync && npm run patch-puppeteer-basic && npm run patch-playwright-basic && npm run create-brave-packages && npm run ai-agent && npm run check-versions
scripts.setup-puppeteer: npm install puppeteer-core && npm run patch-puppeteer && npm run test-bot-detector-headless && echo üé≠ Puppeteer-core setup completed with EVERYTHING!
scripts.setup-playwright: npm install playwright-core && npm run patch-playwright && npm run test-bot-detector-headless && echo üé™ Playwright-core setup completed with EVERYTHING!
scripts.setup-both: npm install puppeteer-core playwright-core && npm run patch-both && npm run test-bot-detector-headless && echo üéØ Both engines setup completed with ALL FEATURES!
scripts.setup-both-basic: npm install puppeteer-core playwright-core && npm run patch-puppeteer-basic && npm run patch-playwright-basic && echo üéØ Both engines setup completed with stealth only!
scripts.setup-complete: npm install puppeteer-core playwright-core && npm run version-sync && npm run patch-both && npm run ai-agent && npm run test-bot-detector-headless && echo üöÄ Complete setup with stealth + AI + testing completed!
scripts.install-puppeteer: npm install puppeteer-core && npm run patch-puppeteer
scripts.install-playwright: npm install playwright-core && npm run patch-playwright
scripts.create-brave-packages: npm run version-sync && npm run create-brave-puppeteer && npm run create-brave-playwright
scripts.setup-ai-enhanced: npm install puppeteer-core playwright-core && npm run patch-both && npm run create-brave-packages && npm run ai-agent && echo ü§ñ AI-Enhanced setup with Brave packages completed!
scripts.setup-ultimate: npm install puppeteer-core playwright-core && npm run patch-both && npm run test-bot-detector && npm run test-bot-detector-mobile && echo üî• Ultimate setup with all features completed!
scripts.help: echo üéÜ BRAVE STEALTH COMMANDS: && echo üöÄ Quick Setup: npm run setup-both && echo üé® Individual: npm run patch-puppeteer / patch-playwright && echo ü§ñ AI Testing: npm run ai-agent && echo ü§æ Bot Testing: npm run test-bot-detector && echo üìä Versions: npm run version-sync && echo üîß Fix Versions: npm run version-sync-fix
scripts.features: echo üö´Ô∏è 50+ STEALTH FEATURES: Navigator, Canvas, WebGL, Performance, Human Behavior && echo ü§ñ AI FEATURES: Intelligence Testing, Auto Analysis, Smart Cleanup && echo ü¶Å BRAVE FEATURES: Auto-Detection, Optimized Launch, Privacy Protection
scripts.test-workflow: echo üß™ WORKFLOW TEST INSTRUCTIONS: && echo === Brave NPM Auto-Publish Workflow === && echo 1. Go to GitHub Actions tab && echo 2. Select 'ü¶Å Brave NPM Auto-Publish Workflow' && echo 3. Click 'Run workflow' && echo 4. Set test_mode: true && echo 5. Choose version_type: patch/minor/major && echo 6. Select packages to publish && echo 7. Click 'Run workflow' button && echo üöÄ Test complete publishing workflow with semantic versioning!
scripts.release: echo üöÄ Creating new release... && gh workflow run publish-packages.yml --field version_type=patch --field test_mode=false
scripts.release-minor: echo üöÄ Creating minor release... && gh workflow run publish-packages.yml --field version_type=minor --field test_mode=false
scripts.release-major: echo üöÄ Creating major release... && gh workflow run publish-packages.yml --field version_type=major --field test_mode=false
scripts.test-release: echo üß™ Testing release workflow... && gh workflow run publish-packages.yml --field version_type=patch --field test_mode=true
